pages.text: I got an epiphany on how to create potions after I created a questionable potion. The first of the ideas is to create a healing potion
The second idea is how to create an oak leather potion that protects against damage.
The third idea is to create a potion of cat vision, because in the dark monsters are not visible!
The fourth thought, since at any moment someone may appear in the cave, you need to create a hurry potion to dig faster
